I currently have Compressor 3.5.3 on Snow Leopard.
Will this 4.0.6 work with my version of compressor  on SL?
Cheers!

@Rizzo220,

Compressor 4 minimum system requirements are an Intel Mac Core 2 Duo and Snow Leopard. So, you should be fine. Further: the Compressor 4 install will not remove your 3.5.3 version in case you need to fall back on that version.
